org.jcvi.jillion.core.io

Class BufferSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.core.io.BufferSize

  • public final class BufferSize
extends Object
    Helper class to compute buffer sizes in bytes.
    Author:
    dkatzel
    Since:
    5.3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int kb(int size)
      Get the number of bytes in the given Kilobyte size.
      static int mb(int size)
      Get the number of bytes in the given Megabyte size.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • kb

        public static int kb(int size)
        Get the number of bytes in the given Kilobyte size. For example, kb(1) will return 1024.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of kilobytes to compute.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes that is.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if size is negative or would produce a value larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE.

      • mb

        public static int mb(int size)
        Get the number of bytes in the given Megabyte size. For example, mb(1) will return 1048576.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of megabytes to compute.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes that is.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if size is negative or would produce a value larger than Integer.MAX_VALUE.
